data.eml:eml: A new species of Thysanoptyx Hampson, 1894 from India (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Volynkin, Anton V. (2017): A new species of Thysanoptyx Hampson, 1894 from India (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae). Zootaxa 4319 (2): 375-378, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4319.2.8
